verses.roman:
hena-mate mahāprabhu jagadānanda-saṅge
nānā-mate āsvādaya premera taraṅge

synonyms: hena-mate—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jagadānanda-saṅge—in the company of Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; nānā-mate—in various ways; āsvādaya—tastes; premera taraṅge—the waves of spiritual loving affairs.
translation: In the company of Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would taste various transcendental relationships of pure love.
